lore: The Banshees that were born closest to Erebyss did so as Valentine Banshees because of her pain. They are unique creatures that go from town to town guided by love. But not the real kind. A Valentine Banshee looks for people who share their lives with someone who just wants to take advantage of them. When one such couple is asleep, this creature places its hands on their foreheads and exchanges their feelings towards each other.
menagerieDialog: (It remains motionless despite your approach, donning an aura of inscrutable mystery.)
(The emotional instability of this creature is truly a sight to behold. If it's not screaming at inanimate objects, it's crying in a corner.)
(Why is this creature always crying? It's almost as if it refuses to ever be happy.)
Let my cries chill the living.
(She's crying, as usual. Perhaps someday you'll find a way to cheer her up.)
name: Valentine Banshee
